title: Video: Maximo Park – Brain Cells
content:
This is somewhat of a change of direction from North East quintet Maximo Park, stripping back the brash guitars that characterised much of their early output, and opting for a more refined approach, that harks back to the more composed moments of their second album Our Earthly Pleasures, rather than their 2012 LP The National Health.

Lifted from their fifth album, Too Much Information, set for release at the beginning of Februrary 2014, Brain Cells merges the intelligent, cutting lyricism of Paul Smith with far more up to date, dare I say, blog-pop inspired instrumentation. From the smooth synths to the programmed drum-machine, it’s quite unlike anything they’ve done before, and it’s absolutely brilliant.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
